info.headline: Tsunami Warning issued July 29 at 8:27PM PDT by NWS National Tsunami Warning Center
info.description:
If you are located in this coastal area, move inland to higher ground.
Tsunami warnings mean that a tsunami with significant inundation is possible or is already occurring. Tsunamis are a series of waves dangerous many hours after initial arrival time. The first wave may not be the largest.
At 425 PM Pacific Daylight Time on July 29 an earthquake with preliminary magnitude 8.8 occurred 80 miles southeast of Petropavlovsk Kamchatka.
Estimated tsunami start times for selected sites are;
Crescent City California 1150 PM. PDT. July 29.
The tsunami warning will remain in effect until further notice. Refer to the internet site tsunami.gov for more information.

parameter.value: THE TSUNAMI WARNING IS MODIFIED TO INCLUDE THE COASTAL AREAS OF CALIFORNIA FROM CAPE MENDOCINO CALIFORNIA TO THE OREGON/CAL. BORDER
NWS: TSUNAMI danger on the coast. Move to high ground or inland now.

The National Weather Service has issued a TSUNAMI WARNING. A series of powerful waves and strong currents may impact coasts near you. You are in danger. Get away from coastal waters. Move to high ground or inland now. Keep away from the coast until local officials say it is safe to return.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Coast; Coastal Del Norte

info.headline: Tsunami Warning issued July 29 at 8:27PM PDT by NWS National Tsunami Warning Center
info.description:

Tsunami warnings mean that a tsunami with significant inundation is possible or is already occurring. Tsunamis are a series of waves dangerous many hours after initial arrival time. The first wave may not be the largest.
At 425 PM Pacific Daylight Time on July 29 an earthquake with preliminary magnitude 8.8 occurred 80 miles southeast of Petropavlovsk Kamchatka.

parameter.value: THE TSUNAMI WARNING IS MODIFIED TO INCLUDE THE COASTAL AREAS OF CALIFORNIA FROM CAPE MENDOCINO CALIFORNIA TO THE OREGON/CAL. BORDER
SNM: Peligro de TSUNAMI. Vaya a un lugar alto o tierra adentro ahora.

El Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia ha emitido un AVISO DE TSUNAMI. Olas y corrientes fuertes pueden afectar costas cercanas. Su vida esta en peligro. Alejarse de aguas costeras. Moverse ahora a un lugar alto o tierra adentro. Mantenerse alejado hasta que las autoridades locales indiquen que es seguro regresar.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Coast; Coastal Del Norte
